description: I am a Back-End developer living in Bien Hoa - Viet Nam. I have a passion for code and things related to technology. My goal is to become a DevOps Engineer . Besides, I also like sports activities like swimming, workout, running, muay, guitar...

descriptions: I have started my web development journey back in Dec 2020 by making a simple Todo application in Javascript from a Youtube channel and that made me to build interest in web dev.

I initially focused on learning and exploring different JS & CSS frameworks and libraries than to just stick around with only HTML, CSS and Javascript. Then after that I decided to opt React as main tech as it was perfect and easy to learn than others, so I started to make many projects with this library.
In the span of the time from the day I started, I have focused more on designing with proper user experience with accessiblity.
I also do competitive programming so as to keep refreshing my Data Structures and Algorithms skills.

projects.name: Amazon Clone
descriptions: Fully functional Amazon clone with neat & clean UI matching the original one.
With payment functionality using Stripe API in test mode which uses webhooks to put all the details of payment into the Firebase database.

projects.name: Netflix Clone
descriptions: Made real Netflix like user interface with only vanilla CSS in React.
Login functionality which uses email and password authentication and a home page which uses TMDB API to fetch a bunch of movie info.

projects.name: Portfolio v3
descriptions: Third iteration of my portfolio series in React but this time with TypeScript.
Responsive, minimal UI and more outlined design with theme accent changing facility.
